Package io.papermc.paper.command.brigadier.argument.resolvers

Interface BlockPositionResolver

All Superinterfaces:
ArgumentResolver<BlockPosition>
@NonExtendable public interface BlockPositionResolver extends ArgumentResolver<BlockPosition>
An ArgumentResolver that's capable of resolving a block position argument value using a CommandSourceStack.
